rukus.text: Eka magani karanaryane tya azaba (siksa - yatane) ci magani keli jo ghaduna yenara ahe
Kaphiranvara, jyala koni hatavinara nahi
Ya allahatarphe, jo sidya balaganara ahe
Jyacyakade phariste ani atma cadhuna jatata eka divasata, jyaci mudata pannasa hajara varsanci ahe
Tevha tumhi cangalya prakare dhira sanyama rakha
Nihsansaya, he tya (azaba) la dura samajatata
Ani amhi tyala javala asalyace pahato
Jya divasi akasa vitalalelya dhatusarakhe ho'ila
Ani parvata rangita lokarisarakhe hotila
Ani koni mitra kona mitrala vicaranara nahi
(Jari te) ekamekanna dakhavile jatila. Aparadhi, tya divasacya siksa - yatanecya mobadalyata (danda mhanuna) apalya putranna de'u icchila
Apalya patnila ani apalya bhavala
Ani apalya kutumbala, je tyala asraya deta hote
Ani jaminivarila samasta lokanna, yasathi ki yanni tyala mukti milavuna dyavi
(Parantu) he kadapi honara nahi. Nihsasaya, to (dhagadhaganarya) nikharyanci (aga) ahe
Ji (tondaci va dokyaci) tvaca soluna kadhanari ahe
Ti asa tya pratyeka manasala haka marila, jo mage hatato ani vimukha hoto
Ani gola (jama) karuna sambhaluna thevato
Nihsansaya, manusya mothya kaccya hrdayaca banavila gela ahe
Jevha tyala kasta - yatana pohacate, tevha bhayacintita hoto
Ani jevha tyala sukha prapta hote, kanjusapana karu lagato
Parantu te namaja padhanare
Je apalya namajace vaktasira palana karanare aheta
Ani jyancya dhana-sampattita nirdharita his'sa ahe
Yacakancahi ani yacana karanyapasuna alipta rahanaryancahi
Ani je n'yayacya divasavara visvasa rakhatata
Ani je apalya palanakartyacya siksece bhaya balagata rahatata
Nihsansaya, tyancya palanakartyaci siksa yatana, nirdhasta honyaci baba nahi
Ani je loka apalya lajjasthanam (guptangam) ce (harama krtyapasuna) raksana karatata
Panratu apalya patnincya ani apalya dasincyakherija jyance te malaka (svami) aheta, ya babatita te nindaniya nahita
Ata jo koni yacyakherija (marga) sodhela, tara ase loka maryadece ullanghana karanare tharatila
Ani je apalya anamati (thevi) ci, ani apalya vayadya-vacananci va pratijneci kasa balagatata
Ani je apalya saksinvara sarala (ani atala) rahatata
Ani je apalya namajance sanraksana karatata
Heca loka jannatamadhye mana - pratistha rakhanare asatila
